DOC.detailed_description: The uncompetitive N-methyl-D-aspartate ( NMDA ) receptor antagonist ketamine propose model system symptom schizophrenia . To complement model system allow neurobiological well translational study , biomarkers often applied people influence ketamine . Here , apply oculomotor , perceptual cognitive biomarkers healthy human volunteer whilst undergo BOLD fMRI 3 Tesla field strength . We use counter-balanced , placebo-controlled , double-blind , within-subjects design . A sample 25 healthy participant require . Participants receive intravenous ( IV ) racemic ketamine ( 100ng/ml target plasma concentration ) one two assessment day receive placebo ( intravenous saline ) assessment day . BOLD fMRI carry Siemens Trio scanner Life & Brain Centre , Bonn . In addition brain functional cognitive , perceptual oculomotor response , also measure self-ratings psychosis-like experience . These obtain use Psychotomimetic States Inventory ( PSI ; Mason et al 2008 ) .
